description: '''Sloppy Jane''' is an American [[chamber pop]]/[[rock music|rock]] band fronted by Haley Dahl based in [[Brooklyn]], New York. The band released their breakthrough second studio album, ''[[Madison (album)|Madison]]'', in 2021, through [[Saddest Factory Records]], an imprint owned by their former bassist [[Phoebe Bridgers]]. Dahl is known for her eccentric [[performance art]] style, which used to include nudity.
